953010.name: Unforeseen Incidents Artbook
953010.description:
The Art of Unforeseen Incidents

The Art of Unforeseen Incidents is a 139 pages PDF - it was a crazy ride, with ups and downs.
The style of Unforeseen Incidents evolved a lot over time, as you can see by looking at the really old artwork from back when work on the game started. Throughout the artist's studies, he did a lot of illustrative work and, being inspired by the work of Ian McQue and Robert Valley, he came up with his very own style.

To access the Artbook from Steam: select 'Unforeseen Incidents' -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Unforeseen Incidents - Artbook' -> 'UnforeseenIncidents_Artbook.pdf'
953010.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
